name: _:Base:Ros2Ardent
text:
RUN apt update && apt install -y curl
RUN curl http://repo.ros2.org/repos.key | apt-key add -
RUN apt install -y lsb-release
RUN sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64,arm64] http://repo.ros2.org/ubuntu/main `lsb_release -cs` main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros2-latest.list'
ENV ROS_DISTRO=ardent
# bouncy not working
RUN cat /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros2-latest.list
RUN apt update && apt install -y ros-$ROS_DISTRO-ros-base  #bare-bones
# RUN apt update && apt install -y ros-$ROS_DISTRO-desktop  #goodies
RUN apt install -y ros-$ROS_DISTRO-ament-tools
